scripts.setenv: eb setenv BCRYPT_PASSWORD=store-password ENV=dev PORT=3000 POSTGRES_DB=store POSTGRES_HOST=database-2.csjxfdqawy39.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password123 POSTGRES_TEST_DB=store_test POSTGRES_USER=full_stack_user SALT_ROUNDS=10 TOKEN_SECRET=dsfds!5434
scripts.deploy: eb list && eb use fwd-storefront-aws-backend-dev && npm run setenv && eb deploy
scripts.build: npx tsc && cp -R .elasticbeanstalk www/.elasticbeanstalk && cp .npmrc www/.npmrc && cp package.json www/package.json
scripts.test:windows: set ENV=test&& db-migrate db:drop test && db-migrate db:create test  && db-migrate --env test reset && npx tsc && db-migrate --env test up && jasmine
scripts.test: ENV=test&& db-migrate db:drop test && db-migrate db:create test  && db-migrate --env test reset && npx tsc && db-migrate --env test up && jasmine
